title: Accounts that are not used
body: Alright, so there's this name i want to change my summoner name to, BUT the thing is that the name I want to change it to "Jeøksin" is already taken and the account is a level one that has no games under it's account. I wanted to send this just to ask that if they could do something about the account because I really want to change my name to that but a level one account that has no games is currently holding the name.

replies.body:
Summoner names must first go **inactive** before you have a chance to purchase them. In this case, if the account stays between level 1 and 6, the account has **6 months** of protection against the name being taken. After that time has passed, you'll be able to take the name after purchasing a name change in the store.

You can find out more about this in our [**Summoner Name Cleanup FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-). Let me know if you have any other questions.
